fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Defend a player's house and Smite all of their visitors at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A defended player will gain Basic Defence for the night.
- A player who is smited will be obliterated, their role and will hidden from the public.
- You will learn the roles and wills of those you Smite.
- You may only Smite twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
